title: Welcome to Endless Energy Crystals, your local metaphysical crystal boutique offering crystals, minerals, and artisan jewelry.
description: As a family owned business, we are proud to supply Sebastopol, California with crystals, minerals, and gems that are consciously sourced, carefully curated, and of the highest quality. We offer a welcoming environment that is open to the whole family! Fin
